member.name: lifetime
member.desc: The time after which the giblet should be despawned.

member.name: position
member.desc: The position at which the giblet should be spawned.

member.name: rotation
member.desc: The rotation with which the giblet should be spawned with

member.name: velocity
member.desc: The initial velocity of the giblet.

member.name: angularVelocity
member.desc: The initial angular velocity of the giblet.

member.name: physTranslationOffset
member.desc: An optional transform offset which can be applied to the physics of the giblet.

member.name: physRotationOffset
member.desc: An optional transform rotation offset which can be applied to the physics of the giblet.

member.name: physRadius
member.default: The physical radius of the giblet.

member.name: physHeight
member.desc: The physical height of the giblet.

member.name: physShape
member.desc: The physical shape of the giblet.
